New Records: Rohit Sharma hit the fastest World Cup century by an India player off 63 balls.
Rohit Sharma became the leading six-hitter in international cricket.
Rohit Sharma scored his seventh World Cup century, the most of any player.
Rohit Sharma's 131 included the fastest-ever Cricket World Cup hundred by an Indian.
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 39 runs.
Afghanistan set India a target of 273 runs.
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for Afghanistan.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan won the toss and chose to bat.
Afghanistan aimed for a target above 300 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed happiness over his century but emphasized not losing focus.
Hashmatullah Shahidi mentioned the need to work on issues and come back positively.
Rohit Sharma highlighted the importance of momentum and different skillsets in the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India completed the win with 15 overs to spare.
The match was played in Delhi.
India's next game is against Pakistan at the 130,000 seater stadium in Ahmedabad.
